channel.title: Getting Started on Mynlp文档
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Mynlp文档

item.title: 安装
item.description: mynlp多个功能被划分在不同的模块中，下面演示分词模块： GRADLE compile 'com.mayabot.mynlp:mynlp-segment:3.0.1' 或者MAVEN <dependency> <groupId>com.mayabot.mynlp</groupId> <artifactId>mynlp-segment</artifactId> <version>3.0.1</version> </dependency> 模块（artifactId） 功能 mynlp-core 基础功能 Guice

item.title: 中文分词API示例
item.description: Kotlin: println("mynlp是mayabot开源的中文NLP工具包。".lexer().toList()) Java: Lexer lexer = Lexers.coreBuilder() //c
